post.body: If you stick to narrowly to one subject it reduces your ability to bring in new readers
yeah I second that
than admitting your parents had sex?
you are certainly correct even if I may hope for a moment of silence.
yeah well acknowledging that would mean admitting our parents had sex and yeah that is a gross thought
I think so I do it, even though many think my blog is just about race. I talk about many issues
well I'm keeping my eye on you, just so you know ;)
you know you are leaving me very little hope of ever achieving peace and quiet again
morning I didn't see u sneak on twitter
I swear when baby screams the windows shake
exactly and not because it is an animalistic drive or an act of perversion due to race and our understanding of it
kids need to know engage in sex cause it feels good not cause it makes u a man or a woman
I don't shave why do I need to get rid of something that is natural to my body?
nope it would be peaceful..I don't remember what it is like to wake up naturally
by the media,,,eg women in rap videos or black man as rapist
no not sexualizing children but teaching them that their sexuality is normal in spite of POC being hyper sexualized
I did get rid of it.
thanks for the retweet
that is the worst...g;night dream of fair trade chocolate
I'm giving magpie a trial for a few weeks to see how intrusive it is. If it becomes all that shows I'll dump it
LOL on Aretha Yellow dress...
oh no argument there at all
I have a special dislike of her, collecting kids like prada purses and acting like she is moms of the universe
I used to like him until I watched a few interviews the man is a mimbo
yes the magic negro angered me. I didn't post it because it came from Limbaugh it was to be expected
oh the huffpo piece yeah that was pretty rude
gal and cow?
that's nice to hear usually I get a lot of resistance and anger in respone to posts like that
latest post http://tinyurl.com/8hge36
thanks for taking the time to read I appreciate that
when it comes to politics a good blog post beats twitter hands down
night dream of fair trade chocolate
not at all.. sarcoid is different for everyone my mother had a remission as well it is just off the table for me mine is systemic
I have had it for three years now with no hope of a remission. Mostly ppl don't talk about it because it is so misunderstood.
well it is so painful that it is not something you can be really active with
makes you wish you had a mute button doesn't it?
it is a very serious disease that many don't know enough about
It's something that I don't talk about much because it has been so debilitating for me
are they still going at you? I am going to pop back in and check it out. tks to your courage I put a post up
watching Paula Dean to get my butter fixation in for the week
3 year old is smacking his father, I predict someone is headed for time out
I cannot wait until the boys hit puberty and their voices drop the screaming has got to stop

Trying to finish writing one last post before bed...
watching Alec Baldwin is really anti feminist

well tweets I cannot stay awake a minute longer, Night and dream of fair trade chocolate.
